website_summaries.verdict: A kit that comes with 3 products to clean, restore, and protect your boat's exterior.
pros: Goes on easily with a sponge or a cotton buffer pad
Oxidation cleaner removes small amounts of oxidation very well
Restores the overall look of your boat effectively
cons: While this product seems to work well, you will still have to put a lot of elbow grease into it or have a buffing wheel to get the most out of it

website_summaries.verdict: A 3-step system that can really restore the shine on your fiberglass boat.
pros: Does a good job of removing the oxidation
Includes a wax and a high-gloss polish that can make your boat look very good
Does not have a bad smell
Easy to put on with a sponge
A little bit of the product does a good job
cons: This system does not provide a care option for interiors

customer_reviews.title: This stuff worked great on a 20 year old boat
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great on a 20 year old boat. The fiberglass gel-coat looks like it is fresh out of the factory. Before and after shots below
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Really good product! Highly recommend! My 1982 Bayliner Capri, being 36 years old, had seen better days. Now, with this combo, it will have many more to come as well. Oxidation remover was the only product I felt was slightly lacking in real renewal power, but the polish and wax was incredibly. Used with a cheap $28 Walmart polisher. No doubt if a better machine was used, a much better result would have been attained. Top section in pic done with oxidation remover and polish. No wax yet.
customer_reviews.author: MankLegend

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: Meguires is fantastic! We left our RV in Yuma, AZ for one summer and the amount of oxidation was very surprising. It looked like our RV had aged 10 years. We take pride in all our vehicles so I researched how to make our RV look descent again. Meguires products got high ratings, so I bought it and ,indeed, it made our RV look new again. I won't lie, there is a lot of elbow grease involved to get the oxidation off and we had to buy a new buffer, but it was well worth the results. Our whole RV travel club has now purchased it for their rigs as well!
customer_reviews.author: lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I took a leap of faith and bought this to restore an old fiberglass tub/shower. I honestly had no expectations but it was going to cost me $700 to have it professionally refinished. I figured for $36 it was worth the risk. Well it did a fantastic job and made a 40 year old unit look like new. Admittedly, I had to do some serious scraping of old hard water deposit and soap scum, but after that, this product brought back the shine, took care of scratches and evened out any discoloration. It is beautiful beyond all expectations and I can't recommend this product highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Crocs Rock

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new again!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the first photo my trailer needed help. AZ sun did some damage and I started from the back and worked my way forward. It took 3 days working at day break till 12 noon every day. Sun warmed up the surface to much after the noon sun hit. Lucky for the cold front that came through with 60 degree days. This product did what it said it would do. I have no complaints. Must admit I wasn’t sure this would work. Happy to say it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Dudeaz!

customer_reviews.title: works okay, not great if you have severe oxidation
customer_reviews.text: We inherited a boat from my brother. It had pretty bad oxidation and fading, I had hoped this kit would bring it back to life a bit. So far it has helped remove the chalking from the bow, but other than that, I don't see a lot of difference. I haven't had a chance to finish waxing it, so maybe after I do that I will see more difference, but if you have a lot of oxidation and the finish is really worn, you may have to see professional help to restore your boat. This product seems best for minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Wowie
customer_reviews.text: I would have written this review sooner but I had to wait for my arms to recover. My boat was looking a little tired from sitting in the sun for years. I used these products as instructed plus with help from some you tube videos and couldn't be happier. Boat looks so good I got started on the RV. Holy cow a who would think that a 36 foot fifth wheel trailer could almost make my arms fall off and that is using a rotary buffer. Very happy with the results. Good product at a VERY good price compared to the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: After the oxidation remover and the polisher, my boat looked MUCH better. The wax took much longer to dry than expected and I ended up staying at the marina until well after dark, at which point condensation prevented the wax on part of the boat from ever drying, so I only got half of it off and then went home. On the parts where I was able to buff the wax off, it looks significantly better with a reflection off the boat that I haven't seen in a long time. If my marina had allowed me to get started earlier, the wax may have dried faster, but the product loses 1 star because of the slow-drying wax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I worked much better than I anticipated. I bought a used canoe that had been on the ground outside for many years, The sun exposed side was badly oxidized, but using this system returned it back to nearly as brilliant as the non exposed side. I was impressed with the product, and how each part of the system worked. I applied 2 coats of wax in the end. It took 2 people about 1.5 hours to complete the canoe by hand.
customer_reviews.author: motocephalic

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on Kayaks Fiberglass and Poly.
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to restore a 2010 fiberglass kayak a few months ago. It took a lot of work but did an incredible job at restoring the finish to about 95% of its luster. I just used it on my 2nd poly kayak last night ( polish and wax) and it revived it in a similar way and I was very impressed again. I will keep this in my garage. I had read that you can't receive the plastic on a kayak... this proved them wrong. See the images foe yourself. This will stay in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: TBerry

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Product worked super well on my 2005 Malibu v-ride boat. I used a cheap polisher from harbor freight with their yellow foam pad for the oxidation removal and the black foam pad for the polish and a microfiber pad for the wax. It removed all the water spots and oxidation and restored a very glossy look! I’m very happy with the results. I plan to polish the illusion x tower with the polishing product. I did a test spot on the tower and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Evan D

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was trying to remove some light oxidation on my 22' Stingray boat. I applied the first step, used an orbital polisher and it removed almost NONE of the oxidation. I then had a neighbor come over and offered me some Pro-Tec Nu Paint Moisturizer. Followed the same step and that removed 98% of the oxidation. I have used Meguiar's on my car for years and love it but this product, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: It went from old dingy yellow to a nice new off-white
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit to wax our RV from 1999. This kit is a 3 step process with a different bottle/chemical for each step. Each bottle/step requires a different type of buffing pad for your buffer, so hopefully you have that available. It took a lot of effort, but after the third step our RV was a totally different color! It went from old dingy yellow to a nice new off-white. It didn't take it back to white-white but it definitely got close. If you put the sweat into it, this kit definitely works!! Couldn't be happier with the results. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, love meguires
customer_reviews.text: Very time consuming, but works. Used this on my heavily oxidized front cap on 5th wheel. The oxidation remover is very abrasive. Feels like it has sand in it. This took the longest but really worked. Didn’t notice much difference in shine after using the polish, but the wax brought out the depth and shine. Recommend this kit if your gel coat is heavily oxidized, otherwise just start with a cleaner wax.
customer_reviews.author: Sdnursee

customer_reviews.title: Bought in December
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December and just opened it up to use a week or two ago (March). There was 2 of 1 thing and another without a wax. Was past time for return/refund. I called Amazon and explained that the wax was missing. They asked if I wanted a refund and I asked for replacement....was no problem. Got the new box...which was right...the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old boat - Looks like new
customer_reviews.text: 3 pack product - follow directions - oxidizer removed the dullness - pure wax made it look wonderful - I bought a marine wax last year and it did nothing - this was the answer for the console and fiberglass exposed areas - Super!!! I didn't expect the result - I should have been more thorough but it still looks a million times better!
customer_reviews.author: artist kate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Results
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on Amazon with high-hopes of restoring my fiberglass boat. Followed directions, spent hours scrubbing and rubbing and......looks exactly the same before I did all the work. Oh well. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Results not what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as to remove oxidation from RV'S and boats. I used the 3 solutions with a light weight orbital buffer. The oxidation removal was disappointing. The polish and was are average. I only did the front cap and not sure if there will be enough of the 3 products to complete a 30ft motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Followed all 3 steps on 30 ft class c and was less dull and shinerer but not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect miracles but will remove light oxidation with a little elbow grease. Followed all 3 steps on 30 ft class c and was less dull and shinerer but not what I was hoping for. I was probably had too high expectations. There was enough to finish rv. Took probably 8 hours with 2 of us for all 3 steps. A lot cheaper than the $1000 a shop in Indy wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: With some elbow grease...this stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I had a badly faded boat, and this stuff really brought it back to life. It took me 2 solid days, but if you follow the procedures, it works well. HINT-- don't use the cheapo harbour freight buffing pads. just spend the money for the good ones...you will know exactly what I mean when you get into this job.
customer_reviews.author: lattle

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for reviving oxidized gelcoat
customer_reviews.text: Bought a variable speed buffer to apply and couldn’t be happier with the outcome. Ended up doing 2 passes with cutting compound to get all the oxidation but that was because I didn’t want to burn anything up. Once I got to the 2nd and 3rd stages it went just like normal waxing. Took a camper nose that looked dead and made it look brand new again! Highly recommend but you’ll need a buffer for best results IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: great stuff if you follow directions and use it right
customer_reviews.text: 1995 conquest in red that was clouded to faded white on the gelcoat. this brought this back fro the entire year. 19" open boe took me about 5 hours with a standard orbital. probably would do much quicker with a polisher. when I was done i could style my hair in the gelcoat. I truly was impressed
customer_reviews.author: Durbijd

customer_reviews.text: Next boat polish I try is going to be an all-in-one product. It’s a lot of work to buff your boat three times. I think the oxidation remover needs to be more aggressive. I didn’t notice anything from the polish step. The wax does make rain water bead up though, so you can tell it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Did 0 for my RV front end cap.
customer_reviews.text: Our travel trailer was fading at the top of our front end cap. Read the reviews and thought this stuff should work. The trailer is about 7 years old. It made no change in the appearance after the three steps. It looked slightly better after the second step. The wax in the third step dried to a haze/cloud and nothing changed when I attempted to buff it.... First by hand, and then with an actual buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hagofsky

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I have ever bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Big Mistake. Horrible. Applied to my boat hoping to restore old gelcoat as advertised. This product stained the boat off white and left all swirly streaks. Looks much worse than when i started. I bought this based on all the positive reviews. Buyer beware it definitely doesn't work for everyone and the worst part is how it made things worse.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: oxidation removal
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing! Our boat has a blue stripe around it and the blue was so oxidized it was white. I only used two of the products and only used a cloth and some rubbing as I didn't have much time. Turned it back blue and the polish gave it a nice shine. If I had the time to use a buffer it would look like new. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Best $ I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 2016 travel trailer a few months ago at an amazing price because the outside was severely weathered and oxidized. I purchased the deoxidizer, polish, and wax and applied it. Now this travel trailer looks brand new. I was absolutely surprised and amazed. It took some time and effort but it was worth it. I will be able to sell it 5 - 7 years from now for what I paid for it. I rarely do reviews but this is the best $30 I ever spent. Wish I had taken before pics.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great on Black Gel Coat
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a 12-year-old black and red Sea Doo that had significant oxidization. Utilized a wool pad with the oxidization remover and high gloss polish with a buffer, then hand applied the wax. A couple of areas had to be hit twice with the Oxidization Remover to really get the shine to show. The High Gloss worked great to make the shine look deeper. I am hoping the wax does a good job of protecting the work that has been put into rejuvenating the black gel coat.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as other reviewers claim. I imagine this would be good if you have only mild oxidation. I suppose it was better than nothing at all. The boat does look slightly better...but I'm still shopping for a better product to do the job properly. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After I finished the bottom section my toy hauler looked like it was 2 tone... now that I am done it looks better than new. This stuff goes a long way, I only used 2 of these for my 42 footer that you can see was badly oxidized.

customer_reviews.title: Best Kit on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have built a few pilothouse boat from scratch and have always used industrial aqua buff for heavy to light oxidation removal so I was skeptical, I'm now a new fan for life with this product start with the 49 the repeat with the 45 witch are both included then finish with the wax. 1 kit is enough for a 23 foot offshore boat of you don't waste any.. The results will shock you if it's your first time restoring shine to a dull boat
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great on aging gel coat
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the oxidation remover on gel coat plus is not too aggressive for painted areas. Polish great on painted areas of RV, and wax applies and removes well. Typical Meguires products working great as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Civdiv99

customer_reviews.title: Just Average
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty much like all the rest - describes how well it works, but in the end is just average. Applied product with a heavy duty buffer on a boat with light to medium oxidation. After 2 application, the color restoration was definitely an improvement but still not what I had hoped. It did not begin to touch the rub marks from bumpers, which I didn't expect but would have appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Foster

customer_reviews.title: Light duty stripper. Polish good and wax is good.
customer_reviews.text: This product does an okay job, but I don’t think if your just needing a light duty stripper, this will be ok. I had to make several passes with the stripper in order to see a difference. The polish is good as well as the wax
customer_reviews.author: Daddy D

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did an amazing job on a boat that was exposed to the elements for 20 years. It looked new when I was done. Very happy with this purchase. FYI the boat was a 17 foot walk around I used about half of the oxidation remover and 1/3rd of the polish and pure wax. It came out great and for only $30 something dollars and a few hours of work
customer_reviews.author: Erik Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this if you’re serious about restoring the finish on your boat or PWC. As a long time Meguiars customer I figured this kit was a no brainier... wrong. Products are sub-par and offer little or no difference to the end product. Even using professional grade machines the anti-oxidizer and polish gave no effect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bradley Umberger

customer_reviews.title: Great product does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what it was supposed to do I’m very pleased with the results are used all three products in a row as recommended and it worked extremely well! It worked better than I expected... I’ve used several other products to try and bring the fiberglass back... But this was the only product that really clean the residue off and brought it back to an original shine... Also the Shine has stayed so far. It’s been a month or so. I’m sure a few more cotes would even make it better
customer_reviews.author: mike s

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Boat-Lovers 😉
customer_reviews.text: Now I know what to get my husband for his birthday every year. And for Christmas. He absolutely LOVED this kit. It was recommended by boat restoration professionals, and worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Restoration kit
customer_reviews.text: The "Heavy Duty Oxidation Remover" included in this kit is a lie. The rest of it will take time to tell if it works. This is little more than a gentle polishing compound. If you do have heavy oxidation, it takes hours of work to cut through it with this product. I bought a good polishing compound past to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Treg

customer_reviews.title: Brought my boat back to life!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I purchased a used boat that had been neglected and had a lot of oxidation. The pictures are of my first pass with the oxidation remover, I hadn’t even used the polish or wax yet. Brough my boat back to life and looks sharp on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Proctor

customer_reviews.title: It yields amazing results.
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders! I specially liked the Oxidation Remover. I just bought a boat that was experiencing significant oxidation. I used this product along with a polishing machine and was able to restore the paint and shine (see photos). A few tips. Use terry cloth pads for the oxidation removal. For my best results, I applied the product liberally and spread it around the area by bare hand before using the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex salicrup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I used on my 26’ travel trailer. I had a lot of oxidation in particular on the cap. Used a power polisher to apply. After the three stage process, trailer looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The oxididation remover is GREAT Essentially wipe on and off with a little rubbing ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 3 yearold Fifth Wheel trailer. Never waxed before and very oxidized. The oxididation remover is GREAT Essentially wipe on and off with a little rubbing on very bad areas. I did the job by hand all three steps took a couple hours . Not sure if the Polish is as good or if needed but i followed the instructions to be sure. I upgraded to the Maguiar's Preminium marine/rv wax and that also works very well. . Time will tell on durability. great product and well worth the money. And as always Amazon is awesome .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Collins

customer_reviews.title: lots of elbow grease ='s great results
customer_reviews.text: lots of elbow grease required...but...the results are worth the effort... my boat is in a shed and the birds do their business while roosting... meguiars removed all the poop stains and once waxed, the poop washed off without any effort without leaving a stain... the oxidizer remover works great...i can feel the roughness disappear while rubbing the liquid in...that's how i know the oxidizer process is completed... once the oxidation process is completed...the polishing and waxing go fast...rub on and wipe off... btw...buy the restoration 3 bottle kit...cheaper than buying individual bottles... they're all 16oz...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to do right. I did it by hand but you really need a buffer for the polish and wax. Do not let the polish dry too much or it’s very hard to get off. Also. I used old bath towels as you would go through a ton of rags.
customer_reviews.author: MJL

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to bring 2015 keystone carbon toy hauler back to life. It is a lot of work to buff entire RV but if you do it in sections it’s not that bad. This product makes it worth it because it makes a HUGE difference and you see results! My RV didn’t look this good when it was brand new. I did skip the polish step a few times and just removed oxidation then sealed with pure wax. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: It cleans, but doesn't remove old mildew stains.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1996 Stardust houseboat with some unsightly mildew stains. I've applied it numerous times, along with other products; glass stove top cleaner, and a shower cleaner, but it still doesn't remove the stain. Darn, I was hoping this marine-grade fiberglass cleaner would work. If anyone has any suggestions, please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H Holycross

customer_reviews.title: I used a random orbital to prevent any 'burn' that an amateur like me can accidentally cause
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the polish or wax in this kit, I only used the oxidation remover. I used a random orbital to prevent any 'burn' that an amateur like me can accidentally cause. It went on fairly easy, and came off pretty easy though a clean bonnet every 6sqft makes it easier. I finished with Star Brite Premium Marine Polish and my RV looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Wax
customer_reviews.text: Polish and Oxidation remover works Great! Sadly that's all I can because my box was missing the wax and instead had two oxidation removers. Looks like my box was opened before it was sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very watery. 2 of the bottles are basically the same stuff. Looked great after applied the oxidation remover, but the next day, the whole RV was chalky.
customer_reviews.author: relaxrn

customer_reviews.title: Works....
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove some oxidation from my boat and to restore the shine. It took a little elbow grease but this product did exactly what it said it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping, this is what you need
customer_reviews.text: If you have oxidation on your boat this is the stuff. Took mine back to showroom new finish and even took out all the minor scratches and dock rash. Look no further, this works.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: These three products worked well on light-moderate oxidation on a dark green 24' hull. Several say it now looks like new - it shines!. We're just tickled that for the work involved that the products work so well. We applied all by hand ...in the future I'd like to use a mechanical polisher. Just enough 'oxidation remover' for that size hull (24' Cobalt). Removes bug and tar spots, tree sap spots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The 3 step process produced excellent results - the exterior surface looks like it did ...
customer_reviews.text: I am stripping the decals and vinyl striping from my fiberglas exterior 2004 Flagstaff camper. The 3 step process produced excellent results - the exterior surface looks like it did new. This is the product if you want to restore oxidized and weathered fiberglas surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, can’t do this by hand!
customer_reviews.text: Check out my video! Anyway product is pretty good, easy to work with even in the sun. This boat I paint corrected with a yellow foam pad then used the finer polish with an orange foam pad.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Agosto

customer_reviews.title: To remove oxidation you need a dual action polisher.
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well. My 5th wheel was badly oxidized on the side that gets all day sunshine. With a lot of work and a dual action polisher I got it off. Now just to keep it shining I must keep after it.
customer_reviews.author: bob smith

customer_reviews.title: exceeds expectations and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this system on a boat that had been sitting outside for over five years with no cleaning or care. I figured I’d have to paint the entire boat to make It look halfway decent again. But bought this stuff because figure “eh $40 bucks could save me a lot of trouble and if not it’s not to much lost” but man this has amazed me. And after a only a half hour of work the formerly faded rough surface is now a smooth glossy polished surface. Of course it doesn’t cover surface scratches but this isn’t intended to. Thanks for making a project boat something I’ve fallen in love with!
customer_reviews.author: Harlin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Nah.. it’s no miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money didn’t work... I tried a couple times made our boat look worse in some spots.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING! My boat hadn't been waxed in years and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! My boat hadn't been waxed in years and the black side panels were WHITE with oxidation. Just as advertised, this three-step system made our boat look brand new again. Yes, it takes some work but everything worthwhile in life does. We did one pass with the oxidize remover and then the second pass with the gloss/oil finish and then the wax to seal it. I usually don't write reviews for products but this stuff WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Marine Product
customer_reviews.text: Works OK. Does help, but have to use product over and over again to get the good look. Please note, my jet ski had a lot of oxidation, this stuff did get it to shine with some elbow grease and a buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzybar

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend to my friends and keep some on my shelf ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanted to get my motor home looking new again, this stuff really works well. Follow the steps and bring back your fiberglass, a electric buffer is a must have. I will recommend to my friends and keep some on my shelf from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: East to use
customer_reviews.text: The system worked wonders on our oxidized boat. I was surprised that it also got out scratches from a dock that had no bumpers. I used a buffer for the first step and hand rubbed for the other two. It was easy, I'm impressed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn good
customer_reviews.text: If you have really bad oxidation DO NOT rely solely on the oxidation removal from this combo. You will need to wet sand your boat first. YouTube how to do this properly. Follow wet sanding with Meguiar’s oxidation removal, then polish, then wax. The end product is a beautiful shine!
customer_reviews.author: MARK S KOZAZCKI

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect miracles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff to polish a boat that was neglected for about 10 years. It worked OK, but I had WAY better results with basic turtle wax rubbing compound (green bottle). The polish made the gloss go away that I received from the rubbing compound, which shocked me. The only thing I used for the entire job was the pure wax. Mainly that is because they say you shouldn't use any other wax on gel coat, if you have stripped oxidation because the gel coat absorb anything else. (dont know the truth of that, but I took the recommendation)
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Luv it, It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends boat and was very happy with the results. I have used Meguiar's for years on my cars. Meguiar's products have always worked for me. So when I had the opportunity to detail a friends Bass boat I was happy to find Meguiar's Marine kit. I did run out of compound. Was short by 5 feet. Used auto compound on the rest of the boat. But the oxidation was pretty bad. All of the products in the kit did their job. It was a 4 day process but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Trailer polish
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 2014 Rockwood travel trailer and it really helped pull the oxidation out of the gel coat fiberglass and shins it up!
customer_reviews.author: StefanieTyler

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get the chalky residue off of my 1996 boat. I would say overall it did very well. My boat look shiny and new for about 6 weeks and then the chalky residue started to come back.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Used oxidation remover and missing wax bottle
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a used bottle of oxidation and 2 bottles of oxidation remover and 1 bottle of polish NO wax. Suppose to get 1 oxidation remover 1 polish 1 wax but didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Coach T

customer_reviews.title: Took my chalky boat and made it shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Took my chalky boat and made it shiny. Our blue trim was dull and chalky and this 3 step product with a polisher made my boat look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: adam Schuster

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: won't do awonderful job but does look better, I would estimate one kit wll do a 14 to 19 ft boat ours is 30 so its not going to be enough, The should tell u how much it covers, Does take off oxy and gives a mild luster better than befor but not a true shine just clean
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Disaster in a box
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and contents had spilled throughout. Not only a mess but now have a quantity shortage Hopefully the product will still work
customer_reviews.author: Dr2

customer_reviews.title: ... way my boat looks if the oxidization wasn't so bad it probably been a once over and done really ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff took my old boat and made it look new don't get me wrong this stuff is not Magic there is work involved I did have to do a lot of work on it and go over it twice but this stuff really did make a difference on the way my boat looks if the oxidization wasn't so bad it probably been a once over and done really impressed with the way this stuff made my boat look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fiberglass boats
customer_reviews.text: My boat had been killed by the sun but after using this system one time brought back to life. Looks great now
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I could get to really get the oxidation off. The work is hard applying 3 products but well worth it. Took about 5 hours for a 30 foot travel trailer. Pics are hard to tell but the difference is night and day. The white fiberglass was particularly bad to show oxidation.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hagu

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: Restored my 2004 camper to new looking finish again. It was a lot of work, but I don't think it can look this good without putting some work into it. All told, I probably spent 15-16 hours on it. I would recommend using a polishing tool to make the job easier. I used a Makita polisher and it helped quite a bit. I would also recommend changing bonnets between steps so that each new coat gets a fresh bonnet. You will be amazed if you do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steve Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use on my 4 y/o 35ft fifth wheel primarily to remove old wax build-up on the front that had become cloudy. Product removed oxidation and restored the gel-coat surface to its' original shine and luster. Ended up doing the entire unit, looks better than when purchased new! I retained one star due to the container seals lack of quality control; one bottle I had to use pliers to remove seal, 2nd bottle seal broke free when I started to shake container and 3rd bottle did not have a seal.
customer_reviews.author: W.G.

customer_reviews.title: It exploded and could have hurt someone!!
customer_reviews.text: This product exploded when I took it out of the box. The bottle was bloated and when I took the lid off the product popped all over my ceiling, The floor, and everywhere else. Tried to contact the company and they didn’t respond. Would not recommend this to anyone. I imagine the product was old.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: When making old boats look somewhat New Again, this is a good product for that! Capt. Cas SRR
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Cas - SRR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit! made my 2000 boat gelcoat look like ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit! made my 2000 boat gelcoat look like new. I ran out of the compound and used a stronger one in their same marine line up and it worked even better along with this polish and wax.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy application
customer_reviews.text: each product does what is says it is going to do used to clean up boat works great
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Yuhouse

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth, clean and glossy.  Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Found this from product from YouTube videos. I was skeptical but figured id give it a shot. It cleaned up my old oxidized stained and dirty 17 year old travel trailer. The surface is super clean, smooth and glossy. I haven't applied polish or wax yet but so far I'm blown away with how amazing this product worked. I've been recommending to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Gel-Coat Must Have
customer_reviews.text: By hand or power buffer this stuff works great. The cleaner removes dull oxidation quickly, the polish brightens it to a mirror shine and the wax seems to hold up well after a few months. It's not cheap but when you put this kind of effort into a job there is no point using anything but the best materials. For me this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Removed Oxidation
customer_reviews.text: This removed all the oxidation and made my boast look new again. The boat wasn't in bad shape, but it's 23 years old, and now looks better than many new boats.
customer_reviews.author: FLHTCUI

customer_reviews.title: Used on heavy oxidation on Rv worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Had heavy oxidation on Rv this kit removed it and restored shine like new. 100% awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Me2

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, all in one box to make boat shine again. All explanation on box on how and when to apply each item
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Its a really good deal for what it those
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good deal for what it those, I'm happy with the result on my boat, it took all the oxidation out and it brings life back to the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Emiliano Sazo jr.

customer_reviews.title: RV protect
customer_reviews.text: Used to protect the area on front of my trailer that gets all the sun.
customer_reviews.author: B and B

customer_reviews.title: Good Product For Light Oxidation
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit and good quality products. Very happy with results. For me, the oxidation remover had to be used twice to remove my oxidation. I ended up buying the Meguiars M6732 two step compound to complete 3 steps (oxidation &polish) for half of my camper.
customer_reviews.author: Birddog

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase it does not work waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It does not take the faintness off it's a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting a lot more
customer_reviews.text: After hours of scrubbing, rubbing and buffing through three different compounds. My fiberglass RV has the same matte finish as it did after I washed it. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Meep Meep

customer_reviews.title: Takes work - well worth it
customer_reviews.text: My boat had been sitting in canal for two and a half months in murky, dirty water with about 3 feet of mud on the bottom. It got ugly. After dedicating a couple of weekend afternoons to the 3 steps, this 1987 boat looked brand new. (One of the keys to keeping your boat young is to never go too long without restoring the original finish). It take a lot of work and I would recommend getting a few brand-new clean white towels to rub in the oxidization. If you have an orbital buffer, use that. For $26, this is the best value I've seen to get your craft looking sharp again.
customer_reviews.author: kidge

customer_reviews.title: Very important to apply in a cool dry area or product will be hard to buff out!
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a 2008 33' toy hauler that we purchased. Medium oxidation on this trailer and it got rid of it! Very tedious and time-consuming to go through all the steps! Lots of elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great packaging, thanks for the excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Meguiar's = the best, great product. Took off years of oxidation and abuse, now my seadoos shine like new.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mijares

customer_reviews.title: Alot of Work
customer_reviews.text: I just finished using the three steps on my 27ft Class C Motorhome. I will have to say it looks alot better than it did before.Started with the oxidizer which took about 4 hours to do. Then went with the polish the next day.Even though I had a buffer it was really hard to wipe off. I wish I would have had two buffers one for applying and the other for taking off.When it came to the final step of the wax I was happy with the ease it went on and came off.The last two steps took about 10 hrs.It waas worth it but a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The system worked great for a 25 year old fiberglass boat. It was hard work but got the Finish to come out like new.
customer_reviews.author: M Croteau

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The name might be big but for my experience not worth the money, sent them back. Surprised they don’t have one to make car smell good. Not impressed with poor results
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: protection only lasted a few months
customer_reviews.text: After 40+ hours of removing the oxidation, polishing, and waxing the positive results only lasted a few months. Trailer is oxidized again...wont use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: 5280 Busa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit for the new boat owner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Kit for the new boat owner! I used this kit to bring the shine back to my pre-owned boat. This 3 step process will recondition your gel-coat boat paint and help protect against mother nature. Great VALUE FOR THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new used boat with some oxidation. This product wirked to bring bsck the gel coat. Very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Festor

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Only thing worth it in here was the wax!
customer_reviews.author: Shinny77

product_meta.title: MEGUIAR'S M-4965 MG Fiberglass Oxidation Removal Kit
product_meta.description: Give your boat the best products! Meguiar's Fiberglass Restoration System is a specialized three-step system that will effectively restore all fiberglass and gel coats. M49 Oxidation Remover will safely remove oxidation, stains and scratches. M45 Polish will restore brilliant gloss to the finish and M56 Pure Wax will provide long-lasting, durable protection to the restored surface.
feature_bullets: BRING YOUR BOAT BACK TO LIFE: Fiberglass restoration system helps to restore fiberglass and gel coats
REMOVE BOAT STAINS: Oxidation Remover will remove oxidation stains and scratches from your boat
MAKE YOUR BOAT SHINE: High Gloss Polish will make your boat shine brightly in and out of the water
WAX THAT LASTS: Pure Wax provides long-lasting and durable protection to your boat
QUALITY AND QUANTITY: Each bottle is 16oz, which means you get more bang for your boat

specifications.Model: Meguiar's M4965 Marine/RV Fiberglass Restoration System
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,234 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
